content:
Yerushalem yeriho yaathraa-maddhye maargatthil
Nirddayamavane marddichu-kashdam moshdaakkall
/tkandabraahaam-mindaathe poyi
/tmooshaayum poyu -murivukall kettaathe
Moraanaagathanaayavane-thaangiyeneeppichu
Rakthashareerangall nalki-rakshichon naathhaa!
/thaaleluyyaa-sthuthiyennavanaartthu.
